sentences.sContent: Slender and decently built, Roberts has the look of a martial arts expert but this is one of those movies where he has a tendency to overact.
sentences.sContent_eng: Slender and decently built, Roberts has the look of a martial arts expert but this is one of those movies where he has a tendency to overact.
sentences.sCn: 片中他表现地细致高杆，有一副武术大师的样子，但是这部影片中他也同样显露出“表演过火”的趋向。

words.tran: 过于活跃的；活跃得不正常的
过于活泼，过度活跃；过度活性

trans.tranOther: to act in a play with too much emotion or movement – used to show disapproval
